name: common-denominators
author: Emett Speer, Eric Lakatos
description: A suite of JS functions to find prime numbers

scripts.build-stable: uglifyjs build/index.js -mo build/index.min.js && uglifyjs build/index.js -bo build/index.js
scripts.build-prod: uglifyjs src/index.js -mo build/index.min.js && uglifyjs src/index.js -bo build/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build-working && npm run build-stable
scripts.validate: npm run build-working && jest && npm run benchmark
